paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V1221I, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Cardiac amyloidosis with heart failure symptoms.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: V1221I is the most common with 3%-4% of African Americans being heterozygous carriers.
V1221I is the most common with 3%-4% of African Americans being heterozygous carriers.

functional_data.summary: The V1221I variant is associated with early-onset disease and cardiac conduction disturbances.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is linked to both early and late-onset forms of ATTRv amyloidosis.
key_quotes: V1221I is the most common with 3%-4% of African Americans being heterozygous carriers.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was primarily from the main text, with no tables containing variant information.
